dynamic-hibernate-statement.hql-query: select pack.fdId as FDID,pack.fdName as FDNAME,pack.fdCreateTime as FDCREATETIME from OperPackage pack left join pack.operations oper left join oper.indexs index <#if fdName??> where pack.fdName like :fdName </#if> group by pack.fdId,pack.fdName,pack.fdCreateTime having sum(index.fdValue)=${fdValue} order by pack.fdName ASC
